description:
MIASMA is an ERC-20 Token, built into and using the Ethereum network. This allows for the token to act as a store of value and be swiftly and easily sent from person to person using a tiny amount of ETH.

MIASMA is a deflationary token. Each transaction will pass on 99.9% of MIA to the receiver. 0.07% is burned forever, and 0.03% is sent to the dividend pool. This allows for MIASMA's supply to shrink overtime, meaning that the tokens will become scarce and therefore more valuable
name: Miasma
